title: BrewBud
description: I led the creation of a user-friendly coffee shop management system, enhancing efficiency and customer service. Utilizing modern technology, I ensured ease of use for both staff and customers, while enabling administrators to conduct data analysis for decision-making.

title: BhashaSarthi
description: BhashaSarthi, your language translator companion, breaks down barriers with seamless translation across diverse languages. From text to speech, it facilitates effortless communication, fostering global connectivity and understanding.

title: Junkie(Discord Bot)
description: JunkieBot, a versatile server management bot, empowers administrators with tools for channel nuking, banning/kicking users, avatar display, and message deletion, streamlining server operations and enhancing user experience.
